message: Week8.json ALREADY COMPLETE with explanations. File has 43 questions across 4 topics (Attachment Theory: 14q, Self-Concept: 8q, Piaget: 11q, Vygotsky: 10q). All questions have "explanation" object with "correct" and "incorrect" fields. Now verifying quality.

Week8.json quality verification PASSED. All 43 questions verified against 5-Second Rule. Sampled Q1-Q14 (Attachment), Q1-Q8 (Self-Concept), Q1-Q11 (Piaget), Q1-Q10 (Vygotsky). CORRECT explanations: cite researchers (Kagan, Harlow, Bowlby, Ainsworth, Murphy, Piaget, Vygotsky), explain WHY (30-60 words). INCORRECT explanations: address specific misconceptions (20-40 words), provide clear contrasts. File meets all quality standards.
